title: Seduced
description: THIS EDITION IS NO LONGER AVAILABLETemptation was only the beginning. Eliza crosses the threshold into Graham's private life and his consuming universe. Within the glitterati, she is given anything she desires except the ability to break through the invisible ties that bind her. As Grahamâ€™s one and only, she succumbs to the intoxicating power of submitting to him to appease his possessive nature. A world away from the beaches of Miami, Eliza's befriends a woman from his past to unearth the secrets behind the man who holds her a willing captive. The man whose insatiable appetite might break her. It's a point of no return if she agrees to play the edge of what could be a doorway to her freedom.
author: Susan Arden
